sentences.en: Background - ventricular restraint is a nontransplantation surgical treatment for heart failure.
sentences.cn: 心室限制器是非移植性外科治疗心衰的一种方法.

sentences.en: Certain other cardiovascular disorders cause right ventricular hypertrophy.
sentences.cn: 某些其他心血管病,导致右心室肥大.

sentences.en: Chronic systolic heart failure is the result of ventricular remodeling.
sentences.cn: 慢性收缩性心力衰竭是心室重构的结果.

sentences.en: DTI has distinct value in assessing ventricular function in CRF patients.
sentences.cn: DTI技术可以很好地评价此类患者的心室功能.

sentences.en: Each heartbeat has two basic parts: diastole and atrial and ventricular systole.
sentences.cn: 每一次心脏跳动都包含两个基本部分: 舒张期以及方式收缩期.

sentences.en: Exercise test is important to the patients with ventricular premature.
sentences.cn: 运动试验对评价室性期前收缩儿童的运动风险有重要作用.

sentences.en: Left ventricular failure results in distention of the left atrium, engorgement of the pulmonary veins.
sentences.cn: 左心室衰竭导致左心房扩张, 肺静脉充盈.

sentences.en: Left Ventricular Hypertrophy and Carotid Intima - media Thickness: Quantity or Quality?
sentences.cn: 左室肥厚和颈动脉内膜厚度: 数量或质量?

sentences.en: Objective : To probe into the value of paraventriculostomy for treating ventricular hemorrhage.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨侧脑室引流术在脑室出血治疗中的应用价值.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the spiral wave dynamics in controlling ventricular fibrillation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨控制与消除心室颤动的方法.

sentences.en: Severe arrhythmias can trigger atrial fibrillation or ventricular fibrillation.
sentences.cn: 严重的心律失常可引起心房纤颤或心室纤颤.

sentences.en: The heart frequently exhibits ventricular arrhythmia.
sentences.cn: 心脏经常表现出室性心律不齐.

sentences.en: The left ventricular mass index was calculated according to formula of Devereux.
sentences.cn: 按Devereux公式推算左室重量指数.

sentences.en: Ventricular arrhythmias may follow the administration of epinephrine.
sentences.cn: 应用肾上腺素可诱发室性心律不齐.

sentences.en: Ventricular fibrillation can occur in severe hyperkalemia.
sentences.cn: 在严重高血钾时可以出现心室纤颤.

words.tran_cn: 腹侧的；[解剖] 腹部的
[昆]心室的；脑室的；膨胀的；腹部的

phrases.tran_cn: 心室紊乱心律；心室性心律失常

trans.tran_en: of, relating to, involving, or constituting a ventricle
